title: T-TOOLS...WHAT ARE THOSE? :-?
content:
Hy there,

I‘m pretty new in 3D modeling and design and i started working in Rhino 3D but i‘m having problems figuring out how to make/get t-tools because i don‘t really know what are these. wikipedia informed me only about NURBS. i need to get as more info about t-splines, t-junktion etc, because i understood it‘s easyer to work with them. Help!? :)

 [‹ Which slab should I use?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905093731/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40004 "Go to previous forum topic") [Programmer CV/Resume Type ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905093731/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40200 "Go to next forum topic")
author: marosi_lorant

comments.content: I’m sure some people around here can tell you about some of the various splines used in computer graphics, but we don’t often hit on 3D modeling here (sure we sometimes do, but that’s not the main thing). You might have better luck at the forums on [Renderosity](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905093731/http:/renderosity.com/).
